Luxury Appliance Repair in Marina del Rey, CA

Precision Care for Waterfront Living

In Marina del Rey, life moves at the perfect pace—where ocean breezes, sleek yachts, and stunning high-rise residences create a sense of effortless luxury. Your home’s appliances are a major part of that seamless lifestyle, combining innovation and design to support everyday comfort. When they need expert care, you deserve a service experience built on the same attention to quality, performance, and beauty.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we specialize in high-end appliance repair in Marina del Rey, servicing elite brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Miele, Gaggenau, Viking, La Cornue, and more. We provide certified expertise, genuine OEM parts, and white-glove service trusted by Marina’s most discerning residents.

🔧 Why Marina del Rey Homeowners Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Certified Technicians for Luxury Brands
    We are trained directly by top manufacturers to handle the complex systems inside today’s smart refrigeration, custom cooktops, convection steam ovens, and more.
  • ✅ Genuine OEM Parts for Guaranteed Results
    Our repairs use only authentic manufacturer parts, ensuring longevity, maintaining your warranty, and preserving the performance and beauty of your appliances.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Service in Marina del Rey
    Your time is precious. We offer priority scheduling to provide fast, discreet service across Marina del Rey.
  • ✅ White-Glove Professionalism at Every Step
    From protecting your floors and cabinetry to leaving your kitchen spotless, we deliver a true luxury service experience every time.

🛠️ High-End Appliances We Repair in Marina del Rey

❄️ Luxury Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Cooling inconsistencies, frost build-up
  • Ice maker failures, dispenser issues
  • Compressor, door seal, and integrated panel repairs

🔥 Ranges, Wall Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, Gaggenau, La Cornue, Viking
  • Ignition issues, uneven cooking
  • Convection fan or steam oven malfunctions
  • Smart oven connectivity or display panel repairs

🚿 Luxury Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Water drainage problems, leaks, or cycle interruptions
  • Poor cleaning/drying performance
  • Smart features and Wi-Fi integration issues

🧺 High-End Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, Fisher & Paykel, LG Signature
  • Drum not spinning or draining
  • Dryer not heating properly or overheating
  • Control board or smart sensor issues

☕ Built-In Specialty Appliances

  • Wine coolers, espresso machines, warming drawers, steam ovens
  • Temperature inconsistencies
  • Water or airflow failures
  • Wi-Fi and smart home integration repairs

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI White-Glove Service Process

  1. Effortless Booking
    Call or schedule online. We’ll coordinate your appointment discreetly, even with concierge services if needed.
  2. On-Time, Certified Diagnosis
    Our technician arrives promptly, fully equipped to diagnose your luxury appliance with precision.
  3. Transparent, Detailed Estimate
    You’ll receive a clear, upfront quote before any work begins—so you know exactly what to expect.
  4. Expert Repairs with OEM Parts
    Repairs are completed with manufacturer-certified parts to the highest factory specifications.
  5. Final Testing & Spotless Clean-Up
    We leave your space immaculate and your appliance restored to flawless performance—backed by our warranty.
